title: Strengthening Web Development Competencies: Therapeutic Patient Education (TPE) for Pediatric Asthma Treatment

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical terminology and introductory knowledge of chronic disease management
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the etiology and treatment principles of pediatric asthma
Learners can design educational scenarios applying core elements of Therapeutic Patient Education (TPE)
Learners can mathematically analyze educational effectiveness metrics using Learning Objects (LOs)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
